name: InvenTypie
description:
InvenTypie is a typing game without typing keys on the keyboard, instead you must collect the letters in your inventory and use that to spell the word.

You must keep the pencil knight alive by spelling words from "The Spelling Master".

If you misspell a word or waste time you will lose your health!

ARROW KEYS - MOVE

SPACEBAR - ENTER WORD

Created for GMTK Jam 2018
